entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
